page.title: 08A Years Work - Ramsden
page.content:
Mr.Butlers family has farmed in Lower Farm without help for 25 years working from 7.00am until he finshes at 9.00pm. New buildings and machinary help.
Mr.Butler thinks farming is enjoyable and rewarding because there are jobs he can do on his own. He grows wheat, barley, beans and rape but only has seven sheep and some chickens. His worst job is picking weeds out of the corn and his best job is making dry stone walls because he likes doing hard work.
Mr Butler's best season is autumn because of the weather,the colour of the leaves, but he looks forward to the new year.
